reviews: I usually buy xl, but I find things too short. With the big and tall the large is awesome. Much longer and more comfortable to wear. I can bend over without mooning coworkers. Quality fabric and manufacturing as well. Great product.

review_title: XXL is like XXXL so I had to get Xlarge to get ...
reviews:
XXL is like XXXL so I had to get Xlarge to get my XXL feel.
I wanted it a bit bigger, but wow this thing is big. I should
Have picked my size and i would still get it a bit bigger. I like the quality also... yeah I just wanted to talk about the size first.

review_title: Well Made Shirt, Too long, even for a Tall fit.
reviews: Well made, but fits far too large. I am 6'4" tall and I got the 3X Tall. It fits WAAAAY too big. This is the 3rd Carhartt item I've ordered like this that's over-sized. It's better than being too small but it really is big. if you order this shirt order a size smaller than usual. After owning this shirt for a while I was able to shrink it in a hot dryer and now it fits. It fits very large, its too long even for a tall.

review_title: Good quality but runs a little big
reviews: I purchased this shirt for my son who is a slim 6'4 and the shirt is a little big in the body for him. A few washes might address that? The shirt length is good and sleeve length is plenty long so no worries there. The material quality is strong, so I expect this shirt to last him a long time.

Very tough shirts. They've held up to construction and puppy bites quite well.
The fabric is quite stuff and not terribly soft, but they are good, tough cotton shirts that will not catch on fire or melt from grinder sparks etc.

Very very happy. Will purchase again Bought for my daughter as she is always wearing her dads. She wanted it baggy. Realistically a small or extra small would fit her appropriately. Sizing is accurate.

Purchased 2 large long sleeve t-shirts. I generally buy xl but for Carhartt they fit a size smaller. One of the shirts fit well but was so long I had to try and shrink it. It’s still too long and now too small in the body and can’t wear it. Other one is way bigger and is wearable but two completely different sizes but both were large and NOT tall. Disappointed with this purchase.
There was no logo on the arm when the shirt arrived which was quite disappointing, if you want it as a work shirt it would be fine.
It's soft and fits about as well as a female can expect a male shirt to fit. It's dark grey and orange, not dark grey and carhartt yellow like picture suggests. Dissapointed about the orange

Great quality as expected however did not believe all the reviews concerning the sizing. I like my T-shirts a little larger but this was even too large for me, will order a medium size just like all the reviews suggested.

review_title: No Carhartt Logo on the back
reviews: The Shirt is supposed to have the Carhartt logo on the back It does not. I find that to be a problem with Amazon they don't force sellers to use real photos so it can be misleading or false advertising.

Best working man's shirt rite here.. My last shirt I got lasted me almost 5 years and I kid you not.. Working outside in alberta, framing houses.. Beat this shirt up everyday, I put this to the test.. I kinda wish I had a picture to show you of 5 years.. Trust me you won't be disappointed

review_title: Buy it, you won't regret it.
reviews: You really can't beat Carhartt for their quality at this price point. Excellent product. Perfect heaviness for a cool working day or a night by a fire.
Was hoping I wasnt getting a cheap knock off at the sale price, but this was everything I love in a Carhartt long sleeve. fits big and thick material. Would recommend, especially on sale

Amazing quality but that's to be expected with carhartt. At first it was a little tight but that was my fault I didnt order the right size so I just lost a little weight lol. Over all it's a nice warm sweater
Carhart generally fits large. I’d recommend shopping locally if you haven’t purchased their stuff before. You’ll find the right fit and then in the future you can order online and save a few bucks.

Didn’t even get to wear it! Received the shirt removed it from the plastic bag and washed it in cold water after drying the shirt the logo on the back of the neck was gone and the logo on the arm is faded already and fits tight in the arms.

review_title: Would buy again but would size down next time
reviews: A little larger than expected but still a comfy shirt and great quality!

The sleeve logo is not a high viz orange much darker, which is disappointing, and there was no additional neck logo. Which is also a bummer. Those are both reasons I bought it to begin with. Fabric quality is ok though
Not as heavyweight felt than the longue sleeve with front pocket and also fits larger. Doesn't have the writtings in the back as showned on the pictures. Not 100% cotton.

review_title: It's a Carhartt... So you can buy with confidence
reviews: Good thickness of cotton, stitching above reproach... Very high quality of shirt, will endure rough usage.

review_title: Wait for the follow up, Happy for now
reviews: I think the long sleeved shirt is a bit overpriced and will have yet to see how many wahes I will get from it before decal fades away
Great product and amazing prices!! Will never buy in stores again. The quality of this product is great for men who work in a trade!!
Definitely ordering a size smaller next time
This shirt shrinks ALOT. Id like to see a company of this size and reputation to be pre shrinking there produtcs to promore a better fit
Great quality. Perfect fit. Nice longer sleeves. My bf loved it. Ty
Great long sleeve, carhartt delivers.

review_title: Might have to return to get the right size depending on which country made the shirt
reviews: I ordered 2 shirts 1 blue 1 black. The black was made in hatti and the blue one was from Guatemala. With that being said the one from hatti fits a lot smaller and doesn’t have the same stretch in the fabric.

review_title: Product was the perfect size for my tall husband
reviews: Product was the perfect size for my tall husband. Shoulders and sleeves fit him just right! For all shirts ordered, colours and fabric great! My husband is very happy with my purchases for him!

review_title: Great shirt - recommend ordering one size smaller
reviews:
We initially ordered a Medium but had to return for a Small.

Son really likes the shirt
I have three of these shirts in three different colours and each one fits different. Quality is good and they appear to be genuine
Perfect fit - purchased for my son and he like the fit very much.
Great product and awesome price, thanks
Bought as Christmas gift for son. Great colour, he loves it and can never go wrong with Carhart.

review_title: Xl feel like a large never had a problem with this brand before
reviews:
I have over a dozen carhartt xl shirts all fit
Go figure the one ordered on amazon is to small fits like a large
I've only worn a handful of times in two years and feel like I got ripped off
Send back however Material feels OK
This is a good quality product. The only issue I had was the sizing was much bigger then regular sizing . I’d say order a size or two smaller then what you would regularly order .

Little big but I also haven’t washed it yet so it’ll probably shrink. I ordered a size down because like most carhartt clothing it is a size large also I think it’s real carhartt witch is nice because it’s cheap and there’s lots to choose from
Good quality shirt

review_title: Order a size smaller than you normally would
reviews: Knowing carhartt shirts, its expected to be a size bigger. Order a size smaller than you normally would buy and itll work out fine. Great quality, they last forever and very comfortable.
Fit perfectly. Ordered an extra large, but is very long. Fits like an extra large tall
Fits fine but the fabric is a little cheap? It feels a bit weird on the skin.
Love these shirts fit great and breath good all around favorite shirts for work. Started wearing long sleeve due to extended hours in the sun.
Hard to beat Carhartt for quality. Fits as expected (4xl) and very heavy cotton.
Excellent quality! Fit perfectly.
nice shirt, shrunk too much in the wash. I'm tall so the arms shrunk passed comfortable to me.
Perfect
Awsome work shirt, fits a bit loose so you can move a round.

review_title: un peu long, mais grandeur o.k.
reviews: Belle qualité, idéal pour soirée fraîche !
Fits great,

review_title: fast delivery amazing shit good price
reviews: I will recommend this shirt a
Good quality. Looks good and washes and wears well.
Super soft material. My husband is a welder and loves his carhardtt
i'm 6'2'' and 210lbs and its a really good fit for me
Carhartt is the best
This was a gift and they loved it! Great material a fits comfortably for working.
Good fit but it is green not black like I ordered. It is also missing the carhartt logo from the back that all my other shirts like this have
Not sure if it's real. Fits way too big.
Great long sleeve work shirt.
Durable, well made, would recommend
Great shirt, great quality and very comfortable. Fits a little larger than most other brand.
Really enjoy the entire product line, durable, fits well as a person who’s heavier set.
Got this for my BF and he always wears large in all brands but for some reason this was too big on him!
Bought this for my grandson as a gift. Can’t wait to give it to him.
Great quality from Carhartt that I expect a little big but will see if they shrink at all
Great Shirt! Got it for my husband. Fits as expected.

review_title: I bought the same shirts in black and for some reason this shirt is huge ??
reviews: Why is shirt way larger than my other kids ones??
Product was in excellent shape.But just a bit large......My fault.

review_title: Other then that it’s great quality!
reviews: Was a little too big but hoping it will shrink. Other then that it’s great quality!
Too big sent back
Bought this shirt in black. Image does not represent what the product actually is. There is no Carhartt logo written on the sleeve. Complete rip off.

review_title: Carhartt always fit like they should
reviews: Fits great
Large was too big
Je flotte dedans
Perfect fit, came when expected.

Really looks good and is made with good material fits good too
, made just a bit big but not bad

Little bit Big. I could have used a large.
Very warm.
My husband’s favourite shirts. They tend to fit a little large.
Kinda short thru the body
240 lbs, 6 ft tall and it is a perfect fit
Fit larger than expected but not bad
Bought for work, I'm 6'1 and 185 pounds. The large was like a dress on me.... girlfriend loves it for lazy days though so no point in returning
great fit and design
Product is fine it terms of product quality. Unfortunately there is no print on the back of the neck as advertised.
Its good for tall guys with a big belly!
Way to big. Ordered a large and fits like. 2xl.

review_title: Nice quality but a bit big!
reviews: Good quality, but I ordered a Large and it fit more like an XL . Definitely recommend sizing down!
good quality but large is really large
Good deal
Bought a tent not a shirt
Fit larger than expected but not bad
Bought for work, I'm 6'1 and 185 pounds. The large was like a dress on me.... girlfriend loves it for lazy days though so no point in returning
